title: Manu Tuilagi: I always wanted to be Jonah Lomu growing up
text:
Manu Tuilagi has revealed that he dreamt of being Jonah Lomu growing up in Samoa and if he can wreak anything like the destruction the thunderous late New Zealand wing caused at the 1995 Rugby World Cup then England’s prospects of defeating the All Blacks on Saturday will be greatly enhanced.

Tuilagi was only a child when Lomu trampled on English dreams in Cape Town but those formative experiences were absorbed as the aura around Lomu grew.

“You would always watch the All Blacks back in Samoa,” said Tuilagi. “It was Super 12 rugby back in the day. We watched all the New Zealand players playing in that tournament. It is exciting now to be playing against them. It’s an honour to stand there...
description: Manu Tuilagi has revealed that he dreamt of being Jonah Lomu growing up in Samoa and if he can wreak anything like the destruction the thunderous late New Zealand wing caused at the 1995 Rugby World Cup then England’s prospects of defeating the All Blacks on Saturday will be greatly enhanced.
